name: Duck Slaughter Simulator
description:
This is a top-down very simple hack-and-slash rogue-like with a bit of a twist in a procedurally generated world. Made for the I can't draw (again) jam.

In this game you kill ducks. And a lot of them. So, a first warning: Expect blood.

The map size modifier changes the game size and its difficulty. For the best experience, play it on the middle. The first one is if you just want to finish the game fast to see its plot. The biggest map is HARDCORE.  But be careful, the beach levels might crash while loading in this setting,  so.. you've been warned.

One last warning: This game have Earapes, so don't play it with high volume.

Created by Arthur Clini, leader of Clini Studios, the creator of Dark Woods MMO, a text-based MMO rpg on telegram. Please consider donating:

https://www.patreon.com/Clini
